channel.description:
Here she comes!
What are y'all doin? I'm headed to parliament hill with an ounce of Super Silver, some magic mushrooms, a tent etc and my buddies hahaha

item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:50, topic:391683”]Was it a different batch? What kind of mushroom was it, do you know? Perhaps they were stored improperly, like in the heat/sun.

An 8th of good quality cubensis mushrooms should be enough for a good experience. Any less then an 8th and you don’t get many visuals. Any more, and the mindfuck is too intense. 8th is perfect dose for me. I’ve done them 2 days in a row and still get just as high the next day.[/quote]I eight 3/16th of some cubes and drank like… 6 beers, few blunts. Lets just say, towards the end of the night, everything was mixing together into one big spiral. Was totally awesome.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:48, topic:391683”]haha those things are rediculous. They come in this massive box. Makes me smile just thinking of them.

At some HS graduation party one year (wasn’t my grad) I helped to roll a 36 paper joint that had almost 2 ounces in it. Honestly I think that was being passed around for a solid hour and a half. Cherries so big were falling out that you could roll a blunt with them. :D[/quote]
how is that even possible? jesus

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Was it a different batch? What kind of mushroom was it, do you know? Perhaps they were stored improperly, like in the heat/sun.

An 8th of good quality cubensis mushrooms should be enough for a good experience. Any less then an 8th and you don’t get many visuals. Any more, and the mindfuck is too intense. 8th is perfect dose for me. I’ve done them 2 days in a row and still get just as high the next day.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:46, topic:391683”][quote author=maniown link=topic=488849.msg3578070#msg3578070 date=1303586282]
My plan to not smoke failed horribly. Ended up smoking blunts, and joints basically all night.

The shroom trip was alright, wasn’t as great as i’d hoped since I last did shrooms just two weeks ago.
[/quote]
How much did you do for both times? Your tolerance for shrooms builds up quickly but luckily it goes away fast enough too.[/quote]

Solid 8th both times. Yeah they say not to do it twice in one month. Was still a great day regardless.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Holic:

and last year we smoked a super blunt

haha those things are rediculous. They come in this massive box. Makes me smile just thinking of them.

At some HS graduation party one year (wasn’t my grad) I helped to roll a 36 paper joint that had almost 2 ounces in it. Honestly I think that was being passed around for a solid hour and a half. Cherries so big were falling out that you could roll a blunt with them.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Well I went to meet the girl I was meant to be trying it with at the pub. She ended up making me stay at the pub for 5 hours getting me totally wasted. Finally went back to hers and smoked a bit and didn’t feel much. I giggled a bit and thought music sounded really good but we both passed out like 10 minutes later. She apologised for getting me so drunk and said she’d let me try it again next week when we are sober.

So yeah nothing yet

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:42, topic:391683”][quote author=the bank link=topic=488849.msg3575864#msg3575864 date=1303420116]
Kutkorners are pretty small, I like the 78mm Zig Zag Orange Naturally Slow Burning. Pick some up when you can they’re a classic

And YEEE on the wraps, totally agree.
[/quote]
Stores around here run out of them too fast, so whites are just fine for me.
Also shoulda seen our blunt we rolled for 4:20. Philly blunt with an 1/8th of legit OG kush. Took forever to finish, and last year we smoked a super blunt (thats a 1/4, for those who didnt know) all day long and finished it just before 4:20, had just enough time to light up our own personal blunts.

Hard as fuck. Dont give a fuck. Smoke blunts errday.[/quote]I’m honestly not a big fan of blunts though. Although my third time ever smoking was 7 of us in my garage with a 16.8G blunt.

And nice on the 1/8 of OG, I had a 3 tree op of OG last year…stuffs awesome!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:41, topic:391683”]Kutkorners are pretty small, I like the 78mm Zig Zag Orange Naturally Slow Burning. Pick some up when you can they’re a classic

And YEEE on the wraps, totally agree.[/quote]
Stores around here run out of them too fast, so whites are just fine for me.
Also shoulda seen our blunt we rolled for 4:20. Philly blunt with an 1/8th of legit OG kush. Took forever to finish, and last year we smoked a super blunt (thats a 1/4, for those who didnt know) all day long and finished it just before 4:20, had just enough time to light up our own personal blunts.

Hard as fuck. Dont give a fuck. Smoke blunts errday.

[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I didn’t plan to make a day of it since I think it’s silly, but the stoners were definitely out and about yesterday. Everywhere I went, I got smoked joints and blunts like crazy. Marijuana pride was in the air.

[quote=“the bank, post:30, topic:391683”]Man i tripped hefty on a city bus…way out of my body (from mush obviously).

Then parliament got rained out so we hotboxed my buddies garage instead.[/quote]

Hahaha as you know I live near Ottawa, but we got absolutely slammed with rain/snow/ice/hail/sleet. I felt bad for all the people at parliament.

We still have a shitload of snow from yesterday, and it sucks because I just put my air intake back on my car, and the filter is right under the bumper. The schools were cancelled from the ice yesterday. I bet stoner kiddies loved that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

update: too many people, did not like.
i was sufficiently fucked up all day and still am.

Read full topic
